amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding in the bill by one percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to cut federal funds in the bill by $4.7 million (one-percent).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 284 (Roll no. 480).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Hefley.
